scripts.android: npm run build:deps && cd android && rm -rf build app/build && cd - && react-native run-android
scripts.android:clean: npm run build:deps && cd android && rm -rf build app/build .gradle && ./gradlew clean && cd - && react-native run-android
scripts.android:install:debug: npm run build:deps && cd android && rm -rf build app/build .gradle && ./gradlew clean && cd - && react-native run-android --mode=debug
scripts.android:install:release: npm run build:deps && cd android && rm -rf build app/build .gradle && ./gradlew clean && cd - && react-native run-android --mode=release
scripts.ios: npm run build:deps && bash -c 'react-native run-ios --mode Debug --simulator "${1:-iPhone 17 Pro}"' _
scripts.ios:clean: cd ios && rm -rf Pods Podfile.lock build .xcuserdata && bundle exec pod install && cd - && npm run ios
scripts.ios:install:debug: npm run build:deps && cd ios && rm -rf Pods Podfile.lock build .xcuserdata && bundle exec pod install && cd - && react-native run-ios --mode Debug --device
scripts.ios:install:release: npm run build:deps && cd ios && rm -rf Pods Podfile.lock build .xcuserdata && bundle exec pod install && cd - && react-native run-ios --mode Release --device
